TaxonIdentification.variety_authority: Tang & F. T. Wang ex Y. C. Yang

TaxonIdentification.variety_name: 宽叶亲族薹草 kuan ye qin zu tai cao

treatment.description: Leaf blades ca. 4.5 mm wide. Female glumes broadly ovate, ca. 1 mm. Utricles ca. 3 mm, beak ca. 1/3 length of utricle. Fl. and fr. Aug–Oct.
treatment.distribution: ● Mountain slopes, ditch sides, rock crevices; 1300–2000 m. Chongqing (Chengkou), Guizhou, Shaanxi, Xizang (Bomi), Yunnan.
